tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_data (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    admission_date DATE,
    discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
  diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  diagnosis_result VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE outbreak_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  diagnosis_id INT,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  analysis_result VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (diagnosis_id) REFERENCES diagnoses(diagnosis_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE physicians (
    physician_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    physician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE diseases (
    disease_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    outbreak_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
  diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  disease_id INT,
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  diagnosis_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
